name: React Mastery Course
shortDescription: Complete guide to mastering React development
longDescription: This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know about React development, from basic concepts to advanced patterns. You'll learn hooks, context, state management, testing, and performance optimization. Perfect for developers looking to level up their React skills.

reviews.comment: Excellent course! Very comprehensive and well-structured.
Great content, helped me understand React hooks much better.

name: JavaScript: The Complete Guide
shortDescription: Master JavaScript from beginner to advanced level
longDescription: Dive deep into JavaScript with this complete guide covering ES6+, async programming, DOM manipulation, and modern development practices. Includes practical projects and real-world examples to solidify your understanding.

reviews.comment: Best JavaScript resource I've found. Clear explanations and great examples.

name: Professional IDE License
longDescription: Get access to our professional-grade IDE with advanced debugging tools, intelligent code completion, built-in version control, and extensive plugin ecosystem. Perfect for serious developers and development teams.

reviews.comment: Great IDE with lots of features. Takes some time to learn all the shortcuts.
Incredible productivity boost. Worth every penny!

name: TypeScript Handbook
longDescription: Learn TypeScript from the ground up with this detailed handbook. Covers type systems, interfaces, generics, decorators, and advanced patterns. Includes practical examples and best practices for large-scale applications.

reviews.comment: Perfect for transitioning from JavaScript to TypeScript. Very well written.

name: Web Design Fundamentals
shortDescription: Learn the principles of modern web design
longDescription: Master the fundamentals of web design including color theory, typography, layout principles, user experience, and responsive design. This course combines theory with practical exercises to help you create beautiful, functional websites.

reviews.comment: Good overview of design principles. Could use more advanced topics.
Transformed how I approach web design. Highly recommended!

name: Cloud Development Tools
longDescription: Complete suite of cloud development tools including serverless deployment, database management, monitoring, and analytics. Streamline your cloud development workflow with our integrated platform.

reviews.comment: Solid tools for cloud development. Good documentation and support.

name: Node.js Backend Development
shortDescription: Build scalable backend applications with Node.js
longDescription: Comprehensive course covering Node.js backend development including Express.js, database integration, authentication, API design, testing, and deployment. Build real-world applications from scratch.

reviews.comment: Excellent practical approach. Built several projects following this course.
Good content but could be more up-to-date with latest Node.js features.

name: Mobile App Development Guide
shortDescription: Complete guide to cross-platform mobile development
longDescription: Learn to build mobile applications for both iOS and Android using modern cross-platform frameworks. Covers React Native, Flutter, and native development approaches with practical examples and deployment strategies.

reviews.comment: Good introduction to mobile development. Covers multiple frameworks well.
